p: Helichrysetin is a chalcone that is found in plants of the Helichrysum genus such as Helichrysum odoratissimum L. [ 91]. In a study investigating the antioxidant activity of natural and prenylated chalcones, Vogel et al. found that helichrysetin is the substance that shows the highest antioxidant activity in the ORAC test with values of 4.4 Â± 0.6 Trolox equivalents [ 92].
